member.name: T:HandOdds.HiPerfTimer
member.summary: This class is used to make high resolution timing measurements

member.name: P:HandOdds.HiPerfTimer.CurrentTime
member.summary: Returns current time value as a double. This value is only useful for makeing relative time measurements. The relationship of this value to system time is unknown.

member.name: M:HandOdds.HiPerfTimer.Start
member.summary: Used to mark the start of a time duration measurement

member.name: P:HandOdds.HiPerfTimer.Duration
member.summary: Retreives time since the last time Start() was called.

member.name: P:HandOdds.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
